name: Frostbiters' Descent
description: Welcome to Frostbiters' Descent, where you avoid icy hazards, while keeping your heat up near lanterns. Use WASD or arrow keys to move/jump, and avoid falling and/or freezing. The Frostbiters will fly after you, and will suck heat out of you if you don't run away. Keep in mind this is a demo, and may or may not be developed further in the future, so have fun playing it!
